title: MacBook Pro 16 inch would not upgrade form Catalina
message:
Good day guys , I have 16 inches, that safari fails to open , so I decided to re install the MacOS, but that didn’t work with a usb stick regardless, so I decided to use DFU to restore the machine , after that I used internet recovery to install the Os, it fails at the ending multiple times , but finally it went through, but I still can’t update the Os from Catalina. Below is the image of the error . Whether I download the image form the store or copy into the desktop , the result is the same .

thank you guys

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch would not upgrade form Catalina
message:
Tried PRAM & SMC reset?

I only saw this error when trying to install El Capitan, or High Sierra on old Macs.
Always fixed then with Date trick in Terminal; shouldn't be the case here.

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch would not upgrade form Catalina
message: I have, no changes. Even when I try to upgrade to Monterey, same error, would not go through

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch would not upgrade form Catalina
message:
Machine works good in Catalina?
Do you really need newer macOS on it?

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch would not upgrade form Catalina
message: Safari crashes and will not open

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch would not upgrade form Catalina
message: Try to recover again using LAN, instead of wireless connection.

title: MacBook Pro 16 inch would not upgrade form Catalina
message: I only use LAN  for recovery. wireless is very slow
